text: Jairo Arias Serna (2 November 1938 â€“ 13 October 2023) was a Colombian footballer. He was a member of the Colombia national football team at the 1962 FIFA World Cup which was held in Chile. Arias died in Houston, Texas on 13 October 2023, at the age of 84. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2023 deaths Category:Colombian footballers
title: Jairo Arias
